long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to enhance your preparation for a driving license on clickclickdrive.de. It provides the following features:

1. Automatic expansion of video questions.
2. Video rewind and fast-forward options.
3. Pause video playback.
4. View the end of the video.
5. Select answers to questions directly from the expanded dialog.

You can close the dialog by either pressing the "Esc" key or clicking anywhere outside of the video or answer options. 

Additionally, after closing the dialog, you can easily reopen it by clicking on the video.
